titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the duty on sanitary towels and tampons, diapers and diaper liners for babies, and similar articles, of any material.
A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the duty on sanitary towels and tampons, diapers and diaper liners for babies, and similar articles, of any material.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the article description and duty treatment of sanitary towels and tampons, diapers and diaper liners for babies, and similar articles, of any material. Grants duty-free treatment of other such articles.
Declares that the amendments made by this Act shall not be construed to affect the special duty rate staging with respect to such articles imported from Australia proclaimed before enactment of such Act.
